name: Easy Gooey Caramel Rolls
author: wilco
summary: I got this recipe from my aunt. It's a Christmas morning tradition and always a hit at church. We sometimes add chopped pecans before we bake.
ingredients: 24  frozen dinner roll dough, thawed, divided
1 (4.6 ounce) package cook-and-serve vanilla pudding mix
directions: Arrange 12 dinner rolls in the prepared baking dish
Melt butter in a saucepan over medium-low heat
Add brown sugar, pudding mix, milk, and cinnamon to melted butter; stir until smooth
Pour pudding mixture over rolls; top with remaining 12 rolls
Allow rolls to rise for 3 hours
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Bake in the preheated oven until rolls are cooked through, 30 to 35 minutes
